name: cinemagram
description: A Community Platform for Cinema buffs.

scripts.build-dev: concurrently "npm run init-project" "npm run start-server" "npm run start-client"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server npm run build" "cd .. && cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.init-project: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd server && npm install"

author: Prathmesh Dhatrak <prathmesh101dhatrak@gmail.com>
